snippet: The debate over the safety of youth football continued, and a former star N.F.L. receiver, Cris Carter, admitted that he put bounties on opponents.
abstract: The debate over the safety of youth football continued, and a former star N.F.L. receiver, Cris Carter, admitted that he put bounties on opponents.

headline.main: 'Sissies' and Bounties, and Kurt Warner Addresses Critics
